title: Predicting The Zeitgeist 2022 1.4.22
itunes:title: Predicting The Zeitgeist 2022 1.4.22
description:
In episode 1056, Jack and guest co-host Ever Mainard are joined by comedian, actor, and writer Fizaa Dosani to discuss 2022 PREDICTIONS and more!

  1. 10 Entertainment Trends That Are Going to Be Huge in 2022, According to an Editor
  2. 10 media execs, under the cloak of anonymity, predict 2022′s industry-shaking events
  3. Global predictions for 2022


Follow: @evermainard @FizaaDosani

Help Ever with their Top Surgery

Facial Recognition Comedy

Listen: Beating Down Yo Block by Monaleo
